title: Entradas de críquet de las Grandes Ligas: Cómo comprar entradas para BCL 2024
body:

Entradas de críquet de las Grandes Ligas: Cómo comprar entradas para BCL 2024

23

Major League Cricket está listo para arrasar en las ligas T20. Vea cómo puede comprar entradas para la Liga de Cricket Senior inaugural.

The Big Cricket League is taking the cricket world by storm as this tournament marks a new chapter in the ongoing evolution of T20 leagues. Many prominent players are set to showcase their calibre, and what makes this tournament unique is that not only international icons will take the pitch but alongside them aspiring local talents will look to make a mark.

A total of six teams will participate in the inaugural Big Cricket League. Players such as world champion Suresh Raina, Irfan Pathan, and Yusuf Pathan are part of this league. Additionally, international stars like Tillakaratne Dilshan and Darren Bravo are gearing up for the competition.

For fans eager to buy BCL tickets to watch their favourite stars and witness impressive talent, see a detailed guide on how to book tickets for the Big Cricket League 2024.

Big Cricket League Tickets

To purchase tickets for the Big Cricket League, visit the Insider website. On the website, look for the BCL label. Next, select the match you want to attend from the available games. After selecting the desired options, click on the Buy Now option and proceed to complete the payment process. Ticket prices start from INR 199.
